title: Econ 問題求教, AD curve

replies.msg:
問題
Aggregate demand (AD) curve will be flatter if:
A. saving is highly sensitive to income.
B. investment expenditure is highly sensitive to interest rates.
C. money demand is highly sensitive to income and interest rates.


答題
The AD curve will be flatter if:
• Investment expenditure is highly sensitive to interest rates.
• Saving is insensitive to income.
• Money demand is insensitive to income and interest rates.

要，但考意到深圳個因素，最好要問下專業人士意見。3串7咁先有價值。搵呀俊搞搞佢

你要諗返解釋AD Curve向下果個flow，之後睇下上面果幾樣野如何影響個幅度。

例如AD curve downward sloping的其中一個原因係interest rate effect
當Price level下跌，Money demand下跌, interest rate下跌, Investment增加，real output增加

如果Investment expenditure is highly sensitive to interest rates
當interest rate下跌之後，investment同real output增加的幅度亦都會大咗
咁即係given同樣的Price level下跌，real output增加的幅度大咗，所以AD curve就會flatter。
